children.onClick: {{sign_up.run(() => showAlert('Verification Email Sent','success'), () => showAlert('User already registered','error'))}}

children.text: Email with a reset password link, sent
{{appsmith.store.loginTab  == 'Sign Up' ? "Already have an account? Sign In" : "Don't have an account? Sign Up"}}

layoutOnLoadActions.name: auth.sign_up_continue
